ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] 1HS vs 2HS
ygData.msgSnippet: Learn them both, of course...always master every weapon skill open to you. 2hs is bigger hits but usually less aggro, useful for when you re not the MT of a
ygData.messageBody:
Learn them both, of course...always master every weapon skill open to you.
2hs is bigger hits but usually less aggro, useful for when you're not the MT
of a group or raid but want to get your licks in anyway. 1hs is faster,
typically more aggro, and allows you to use a shield for bash.
----- Original Message -----
From: Greg <freechylde@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 05, 2004 7:36 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] 1HS vs 2HS


>
> Greetings....
>
> I have been playing EQ for a long time, played nearly every class
> with most races. I feel I am knowledgeable about many things in
> regards to each class, race, etc. Yet, there is the one question
> that evades me.. For the "Knight" classes, (Shadowknights and
> Paladins), what is better..the traditional 1hs or the 2hs. I have
> seen people, including my friends who do 2hs, and some that do 1hs.
> What are the pros and cons of each...so I can decide which way to go
> with my new pally...
>
> thanks
>
>
